title: With it being the preseason, why don't we have 3v3?
body: With it being the preseason why dosn't Riot use this time to actually see if the 3v3 community is actually as small as they believe.

replies.body: Not enough  players on OCE to be bothered paying the cost of maintaining TT.

I really want TT back as it was personally my favorite game mode and my friends also enjoy this immensely. The people at riot argue it is to small but I think that is false. I think a lot of people would enjoy playing this game mode in the future.

However they may not release it on OCE for a couple more years (which is pretty stupids).

It aggrevates me that just because I am not on NA, I can't play this mode!
I can't wait until TT becomes part of the LCS so we in OCE can't participate.

Because releasing at some random time other than say "start of the season", "end of the season" or something like "special celebration day" yields a more accurate depiction on how big the permanent 3v3 player base is?

That is, if they ever plan to actually release the thing on OCE.

I am still waiting for Dominion.
